action.action-desc: Mr. Williams of Texas (for himself, Mr. Luetkemeyer, and Mr. Hill) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal agencies from requiring lenders to estimate a borrower’s race or ethnicity via visual observation or surname.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing Racial Profiling in Lending Act.

section.header: Prohibition on estimating race or ethnicity
section.text: A Federal agency may not require any person or entity, when extending credit, to estimate a borrower’s race or ethnicity via visual observation or surname.
